message.content:
cs.IT, cs.COMM, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the detection and decoding of LDPC coded MIMO systems, which falls under the information theory (cs.IT) and communication (cs.COMM) sub-categories. The proposed receiver utilizes the FEC code information, which involves error correction techniques, and hence can also be categorized under the signal processing (cs.SI) sub-category. The receiver is non-iterative, which implies that it does not involve any optimization or learning algorithms, and hence can be categorized under the non-iterative optimization (cs.NI) sub-category. Finally, the paper proposes a joint detection and decoding approach that provides improved reliability, which can be categorized under the machine learning (cs.LG) sub-category.
